name: Mighty Flame Swordsman
desc:
2 monsters with different names
All Warrior monsters on the field gain 500 ATK. If this Link Summoned card you control is destroyed by battle or opponent's card effect: You can target 1 Warrior non-Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Mighty Flame Swordsman" once per turn.
